data.title: Customer Service Numbers
data.meta_description: NCDOR provides live telephone assistance Monday through Friday, excluding holidays. Recorded information about many frequently asked questions is available 24/7.
data.text:
Before you call

Answers to most general tax questions can be found on our website. Use the following links to find information about some of the most popular tax topics.

Pay a Bill or Notice

Request a Payment Plan

Register Your Business

Where's My Refund?

Prepare for your call

To make your call as quick and helpful as possible, please have your information ready before you call. You may need to provide the following information:

Social security number (SSN), federal employer identification number (FEIN), or NC account ID number

Driver's license number

A bill or notice number from NCDOR

Note, if you call about someone else, we must have a power of attorney on file that allows you to represent the taxpayer.

Contact Numbers by Tax Topic

Recorded information on many frequently asked questions is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by calling 1-877-252-3052. Automated individual income tax refund information is also available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by calling 1-877-252-4052.

Live telephone assistance is available to answer your questions Monday through Friday, excluding holidays, according to the schedule below.

Tax Topic Contact Number Live Assistance Hours Refund Inquiry - Individual Income Tax Only 1-877-252-4052 7 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Forms 1-877-252-3052 7 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

Corporate & Franchise Tax
